incidents.name: Private offering and Porting Request forms are currently unavailable in Console

incident_updates.body: The issues with Private Offering and International Porting fulfillment at Twilio has been resolved, and the Console is operating normally at this time.

Private Offering and International Porting fulfillment at Twilio are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

While we have identified the issue, our engineering team is continuing to work on a fix for the issues affecting Private Offering and International Porting fulfillment at Twilio. While customers are still able to submit requests, confirmation emails are being sent and fulfillment may be delayed. Our team is working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will provide another update in 16 hours or sooner if additional information becomes available.

We are actively investigating ongoing issues affecting Private Offering and International Porting fulfillment at Twilio. incidents.name: Lookup V2 Errors for Packages SIM Swap and Identity Match

incident_updates.body: Twilio Lookup V2 was degraded for 4 days between 01/22 to 01/26. During this period of time customers may have experienced 60606 errors for packages SIM Swap and Identity Match. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Video Transcriptions Issue

incident_updates.body: Twilio VIDEO - Realtime Transcriptions & Group Rooms was degraded for 28 minutes between 05:34 - 06:02 Pacific Time on 01/20/2026.  During this period of time, some customers failed to connect to Group Rooms using voice calls and some were unable to use Video Transcriptions. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Verify OTP Email Message Delivery Delays Impacting Gmail

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing delays in Verify Email OTP delivery for messages sent via SendGrid, primarily which was impacting Gmail recipients. This incident has been resolved.

We continue experiencing delays in Verify Email OTP delivery for messages sent via SendGrid, primarily impacting Gmail recipients. This behavior is due to an ongoing issue on the Gmail side, and we are actively monitoring with Google.

Our engineering team continues to track this closely in coordination with SendGrid. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still experiencing delays in Verify Email OTP delivery for messages sent via SendGrid, primarily impacting Gmail recipients. This behavior is due to an ongoing issue on the Gmail side, and we are actively monitoring with Google.

Our engineering team continues to track this closely in coordination with SendGrid. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified that the Verify OTP email delivery delays are related to an ongoing issue impacting Gmail delivery on our email provider, SendGrid.
Emails are being successfully accepted by Gmail's mail servers; however, Gmail is currently experiencing delays in delivering messages to recipient inboxes. Other email providers are not affected.
Our teams are actively monitoring the situation and coordinating with SendGrid as they continue to track updates from Google. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected Verify OTP email message delivery delays since 5:00 AM PT. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Account Upgrade Attempts Returning Error Messages

incident_updates.body: The issue causing some customers to be unable to upgrade their accounts has been resolved.

The issue causing some customers to be unable to upgrade their accounts has been mitigated. Customers should now be able to upgrade their accounts without issue. We are continuing to carefully monitor recovery to ensure recovery is sustained. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some customers are currently experiencing error messages when attempting to upgrade their accounts in Console. Affected users may see error messages alerting them to wait up to 60 seconds before retrying. As a workaround, customers should attempt to upgrade via https://console.twilio.com/account/upgrade. Our team is actively investigating the issue and working to restore normal functionality. We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Missing Recommendations Banner in Console

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging Insights was degraded for approximately 653 minutes between 04:00 and 14:52 Pacific Time on 01/20/2026. During this period, customers may have experienced missing Recommendations banners in the Console. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are investigating an issue where the Recommendations banner was not visible in Messaging Insights within the Twilio Console. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
